item.title: AWS Cost Tool
item.description: [features="total-cost-dashboard"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/dashboard.svg); } [features="aws-services-cost"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/pie-chart.svg); } [features="ec2-recommendation"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/ec2-sizing.svg); } [features="boxplot-report"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/boxplot-report.svg); } .aws-head .row:before { content: ""; position: absolute; left: 100px; background-image: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/test-hero.png); width: 300px; height: 300px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain; } .aws-head .row:after { content: ""; position: absolute; right: 100px; background-image: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/test-right.png); width: 300px; height: 300px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain; } @media only screen and (max-width: 1450px) { .

item.title: AWS Cost Tool
item.description: Using Metricly's AWS Sizing Tool Achieve instance-level AWS cost savings without compromising on performance. Try 21 Days Free Skip To Guide Using Our AWS Sizing Tool Rightsizing Your EC2s Monitoring The Changes Create an Ongoing Strategy AWS Sizing is Confusing Setting up the right instance when there are over 400,000 unique EC2 SKUs (products) to choose from doesn't just sound like a challengeâ€“it is one.

item.title: Monitoring
item.description: [features="tv-projection"] h4:before { content: ""; } [features="flexible-dashboard"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/flexible-dashboard.svg); } [features="ad-hoc-graphing"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/ad-hoc-graphing.svg); } [features="tv-projection"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/tv-projection.svg); } [features="sudden-change"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/sudden-change.svg); } [features="metric-bands"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/metric-bands.svg); } [features="multiple-conditions"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/multiple-conditions.svg); } [features="pre-configured-policies"] h4:before { content: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/icons/monitoring/pre-configured.svg); } .monitoring .aws-head { background: #2D516C; } .aws-head .row:before { content: ""; position: absolute; left: 100px; background-image: url(/wp-content/uploads/assets/graphics/features/monitoring-left.svg); width: 300px; height: 300px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain; } .
